plurals.name: dlg_message_deletion_confirmation
plurals.item: Okurekhodiwe kwakho kuzosuswa ingunaphakade. Lesi senzo asikwazi ukuhlehliswa.
Okurekhodiwe kwakho kuzosuswa ingunaphakade. Lesi senzo asikwazi ukuhlehliswa.

plurals.name: dlg_message_deletion_permanent_confirmation
plurals.item: Ukurekhodwa akwenziwe ikhophi yasenqolobaneni. Lokhu kuzosuswa unaphakade. Awukwazi ukuhlehlisa lesi senzo.
Ukurekhodwa akwenziwe ikhophi yasenqolobaneni. Lokhu kuzosuswa unaphakade. Awukwazi ukuhlehlisa lesi senzo.

plurals.name: download_failure_description_storage_full
plurals.item: Ayikwazi ukulanda ukurekhodwa ngoba isitoreji sedivayisi sigcwele. Thepha ukuze ubuyekeze.
Ayikwazi ukulanda ukurekhodwa ngoba isitoreji sedivayisi sigcwele. Thepha ukuze ubuyekeze.

plurals.name: og_backup_failed_title
plurals.item: izinto ezingu-%1$d zehlulekile ukwenza ikhophi yasenqolobaneni
izinto ezingu-%1$d zehlulekile ukwenza ikhophi yasenqolobaneni

plurals.name: snackbar_message_download_failed_storage_full
plurals.item: Isitoreji sedivayisi sigcwele. Ayikwazi ukulanda ukurekhodwa.
Isitoreji sedivayisi sigcwele. Ayikwazi ukulanda ukurekhodwa.
